title: Glacier Bay National Park & Preserve: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Bartlett Cove Public Boat Ramp Closure  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Bartlett Cove Public Boat Ramp Closure  To reduce congestion related to the Huna Tribal House Dedication, the Bartlett Cove public boat ramp will be closed from 10pm August 24th through 9pm August 25th. more              Glacier Bay TODAY!           Glacier Bay Live! Webcams   Enjoy the live view of the Inner Lagoon and Public Dock. These webcams provide serene views that change by the minute.          What's the Weather What's the Weather   What to expect, and current conditions          A massive tide range Glacier Bay Tides   Every six hours, up to 24 feet of water flow in or out of Glacier Bay. This mixing is a major force...an ecosystem in itself!
